website_summaries.verdict: A few quirks aside, if you frequently lift heavier weights and want a durable adjustable dumbbell set that won't break the bank, this kit is a fine choice.
pros: Generates praise for its gym-quality construction, including sturdy cast iron plates
cons: The end caps that hold the plates onto the handles aren't secured, making it easy to lose the small pieces

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: The price is great! They work very good. The one thing which isn't all that bad is there are some rubber gaskets in the tightners. They fall off when you unscrew them to change weights. You just have to put them back in. Annoying but no big deal. Maybe super glue will help.
customer_reviews.author: McMeekin

customer_reviews.title: defective handle threading - permanently stuck
customer_reviews.text: Thought I loved these but the first time I decided to switch the weights, the screw on thing got permanently stuck. I didn't tighten it much - just sort of tapped it and let it spin into place, but it is beyond stuck. I tried tapping it to loosen and even some WD40. Really disappointed. It looks like maybe a default in the threading on one of the handles... It happened mid-workout, too, so I was extra bummed. Hoping the seller might replace the handle, so I'll reach out to them shortly. Just be aware that this might happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Missing weights
customer_reviews.text: My order of 40lb dumbbels just arrived, but inside were only 4ea of 5lbs and 4ea of 3lbs weights. What I received is not what I offered/paid for. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JPjrF

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bough these a few months ago and so far they're working out perfectly. I did read a review before purchasing about the rubber pieces falling off and they do in fact do that a lot. MAKE SURE you have those rubber, circular pieces on BOTH ends or else the weights will shift and you won't get a secure fit when using them. There is one where you put on the weights and another inside the circular screw. When you do a lot of removing of the weights, the one in the screw will come out a lot so be careful to check it every time it's removed. I plan on purchasing more plates but for now, these work great.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but plates come loose easily
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far, only used it a couple of times. Only issue is the screws that hold the plates in place come loose very easily so it's a bit scary doing curls and then randomly noticing one of the plates swirling about to fall down. Also the hard metal can KILL your fingers if you're not careful- when dealing with the loose plates watch that your fingers don't get pinched. Additionally, with these you NEED weight lifting gloves or you'll get blisters after the first lift.
customer_reviews.author: Miks

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love these adjustable barbells! I had a pair of 5lb and 8 lb dumbbells but wanted some heavier ones as I was building some strength in my arms. A pair of 20 lb dumbbells are just as expensive as these and I like that these are adjustable so I only need one pair. I am not into heavy weight lifting, just toning and strengthening. I don't notice any metal shavings coming off and although I check before every workout I have not noticed anything coming loosened. Would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: GeanBeanz

customer_reviews.title: Great for home, affordable, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love these dumbbells! Very easy to use at home for the times I can't make it to the gym. Easy to adjust the amount of weight, good metal hand grips, weights secure properly. I'd buy these again! My boyfriend, who is taller/bigger than me, also is able to utilize these weights effectively and get a good burning workout - so I'd recommend for any age, sex, size/weight, and ability levels! You can be creative and if you need lower weight, just use the discs separately without the bars. I've had these for about 1-2 years and they still look like new. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: O. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Since I travel between states often, I decided to get a weight set to leave at my parent's home so I can workout in their garage instead of going to the gym on those cold, rainy days....That way I can even workout late night if needed. No excuses😉....So far, I'm happy with them. They seems heavier than normal bells at the gym but, if I had to give one negative....I just wish the handles were a bit thicker! But, overall great deal for all pieces for under $40!🖒💪
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product! 3 stars because it's really absurd that the 52.5lbs set is not really a set as it comes with only one handle. It's so absurd that I didn't even thought to look it up before completing the transaction, you can imagine my surprise when I open the box. Otherwise, they are (it is) very sturdy weights. Common man! Is it really too much to include both handles?
customer_reviews.author: chucojose

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great dumbbells for the price. You might think dumbbells are dumbbells but the small details make them easier and safer to use. For example the grip section of the bar is metal instead of rubber like my current ones. The rubber will soon break apart and no longer protect your hands from the weights. The locking spindles also have a rubber ring to lock them better in place. The plating of the weights and bar look to be good quality to reduce rusting or chipping. You definitely don't want that stuff falling into your eyes while benching with them. Standard 1 inch bar will allow mix and match weights from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JayVee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and functional barbells, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: These barbells serve their function and are of pretty good quality. I got them as a spare pair and so do not use them daily. It's convenient that one doesn't have to purchase several different barbells of different weights since these are adjustable. I do notice that during use even with the supports firmly tightened, they do tend to loosen and then the plates get a bit shifty. The silver coating on the bars also peels a little bit. Other than that, they are functional and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great price compared to other comparable weights and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the weights and they are of good quality. My only issue is probably more with myself than the weights, but they were a little too wide to do some of the arm exercises I was wanting to use them for, it would hit my side as opposed to stationary weight. I really think they are great weights, so I would still give them full stars for quality and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Gym Addition
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this dumbbell set is a great value and of solid quality. I purchased additional weight plates (Weider Standard Plates, which have a 1” hole) and they fit & work well with these handles. I have used the handles with 70lbs on each for dumbbell bench press without issue. I typically don’t go with more than 3-plates per side. Pics show handles with 26lbs of included weights (4 @ 5lbs & 2 @ 3lbs) and 70lbs of Weider Standard weights (2 @ 25lbs & 2 @ 10lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase for my son. They are good quality dumbbells, easy to hold/grip and good for beginners. I purchased the 40lb. Option and expected to receive the connector but upon contacting the seller they clarified it's an additional charge for the connector. Although, the description mislead me, the seller was excellent at clarifying the situation. They responded quickly to my concerns and let me Know I could still purchase the connector at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: G.Esco

customer_reviews.title: Great value for weights.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality bar and barbells. Weights are solid (not plastic filled with sand/concrete) and well constructed. Handled is also solid with a nice checkering for added grip. I like the spinning lock nuts, providing a secure lock for the weights. For the price, the quality is very good and these should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck & Karen

customer_reviews.title: The second set that was sent was perfect! For those that comment that the holding rings ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the original order because one of the weights would not go onto the bar. The second set that was sent was perfect! For those that comment that the holding rings get loose - put a rubber washer or just wrap a large rubber band around the bar between the weight(s) and rings to secure them more tightly. But ALWAYS check they are secure after each set!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: ok but collars don't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: I have to constantly check the collars to see if they are tight. They seem to loosen as I use the weights. Other than that, I enjoy the adjustable dumbbells and they suit my workout needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle T

customer_reviews.title: The star locks get loose
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem with the star locks. They get loose very easily, so during a workout, there is a risk of the plates falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Angel H

customer_reviews.title: Do you even lift bro?
customer_reviews.text: Do you even lift bro? No, no I do not. But, these make me want to want to. Unlike others I have had over the years, the coating does not fleck-off nor does it arrive smelling like machine oil. These are nice. If you're shopping for something like this. . . Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan O

customer_reviews.title: Best quality/value out there
customer_reviews.text: For the adjustable dumbbell this is extremely good quality and value. Compared to the cheap plastic concrete set this is smaller and more sturdy. I bought a 40 lb set and four pieces of 10 pounds CAP weight ($7.9 a piece now) Total 80 pounds with two dumbbells cost $65, very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: rough on the gripping part
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to use since the bar is to rough. It gives me a hard time to hold the dumbbells longer because of it. Anything else about it is fine. I really didn’t wanna gloves for it so I might just suck it up snd if it hurts , I’ll probably just use my dirty clothes
customer_reviews.author: Celine Borja

customer_reviews.title: It works fine to do work out my biceps
customer_reviews.text: I use when I don't have time to make it to the gym and have to work out quickly at home. It works fine to do work out my biceps, triceps, back, and shoulders, However, I did acquire a metal splinter in my left thumb that required a doctor's office visit in order to remove it! That was a month ago. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Since this is the first time I've done dumbbells regularly, take this as a novice's perspective. But I do love them and have been using them almost daily since they arrived. Handle can feel a bit rough at times, but for the price, I didn't expect anything better. I just use a small towel for better grip. Other than that, pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Minato

customer_reviews.title: weights and bars are og good quality, just wish the bar circumference was bit ...
customer_reviews.text: weights and bars are og good quality, just wish the bar circumference was bit broader so it could wrap around the palm better. The threaded bar keeps the weights in place and the grip is excellent. They were sipped very quickly got them in 3days, the finish is ok, but no complains given the prize and quality of the product, recommend it. Just note that the total weight is inclusive of the bar and the lock screws.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: I Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to buy these weights they are pretty high quality dumbbells especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Small and convinient
customer_reviews.text: They are relatively small and convenient when trying to do small workouts at home before going to the gym. The only thing I did not like was the way the handle was made. Whatever that thing was coated or wrapped with started to peel the same day I tried them. Still worth buying, it is cheap and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find for some good dumbbells. Everything came brand new, with nothing scratched or missing. I prefer these types of dumbbells because I can always buy more weights to add on instead of buying more dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I got the 40 pounds one, and it's definitely good value for money. The quality is good and it holds the weights tight. The only down side is that the plates are on the thicker end, I just wish it can be thinner so that the handles can hold more weights, or if the handle for 40 pounds set can be 16" instead of 14".
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: No problems at all
customer_reviews.text: No stinky smell, no splinters, no issues. The dumbbells look good. Everything was packed nicely. I got the 40 pound pack. There was a 1 day delay in delivery but I was in no hurry, so whatever. All the parts are nicely polished, no signs of prior usage. Totally worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vaishnavi B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid dumbbells; need to be re-tightened occasionally
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes they come a little loose between sets. Depends on the exercise being performed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product....not so great shipping
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are wonderful, exactly as advertised, and we couldn't be happier with them!! When we got the package (which took a little longer than expected), though it had been double boxed (a cardboard box inside a standard UPS box), one of the bars had busted through the corner and was threatening to exit both boxes. I hope the company is able to reinforce a little better so there isn't an accident or someone's product doesn't arrive intact - because truly, these are some fantastic weights. Excellent quality and perfect for my beginning weight-lifter.
customer_reviews.author: MoMiles

customer_reviews.title: metal shards in hands
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these every now and then when I can't make it to the gym. I keep finding metal shards splintering into my hands when using. Most certainly won't be buying anymore like this
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The weights always loosen the bells. Most times I lift them up, they will come loose and shake on the bell and I have to re-"tighten" them. It is cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Gave them to my brother.
customer_reviews.text: He liked them, but complained that it messes up his "flow" when he works out.
customer_reviews.author: Udokamma Chibuzo

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These were the most value for money dumbbells that I found. They are really flexible because I don’t have to buy different dumbbells for different weights, I can manually change the weights on this one. They are made up of great quality material as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Sangani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: these little weights fit right under my bed for early morning quick little work out and right before bed
customer_reviews.author: Will L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Handles add about 2 lbs to toal weight lifted. Bells fit on my bench rack. Can put my existing bells on as well
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, but bolts suck!
customer_reviews.text: I love these weights. They are great, but the bolts keep on getting lose after a few bicep curls. It is annoying to have to tight them every time!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Philips

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, delivered on time. Seem to be of high quality but it will take more time to tell if they wear. Great for busy days away from the gym, just needed some free weights to toss around to feel like I did something at the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bars were a smaller diameter than the others and I was disappointed. I had hoped that I could use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within time promised. Ordered this to compliment the 105 lbs. set I ordered earlier. These bars were a smaller diameter than the others and I was disappointed. I had hoped that I could use the 3 lb. plates with my other set but cannot. They work great and I don’t have to change plates during workouts, with this addition. I should have paid more attention to physical dimensions. Still, I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting a few reps without spending a lot of money or taking up a bunch of space at work.
customer_reviews.author: bigstick

customer_reviews.title: never received "connector bar" to turn dumbell into barbell
customer_reviews.text: they're weights and they work well as weights. no defects in the one i received. didn't get the connector bar that it showed in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Samurai Angel-Bello

customer_reviews.title: Muse have
customer_reviews.text: The best weights I ever got can’t go wrong with classic 👍🏼❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: these dumbells are great. However
customer_reviews.text: On their own, these dumbells are great. However, I expected them to be compatible with my pair of 100lb Yes4All dumbells. These handles are skinnier and their plates have correspondingly smaller holes.
customer_reviews.author: Blub

customer_reviews.title: The coating breaks off.
customer_reviews.text: The chrome coating can easily break and flake off and give you metal splinters. I have had these for one year and nearly all the chrome around the threads have flaked off. The adhesion of the coating is extremely poor, I would advise to go else where for weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He has owned these for almost a year now and they have held up great. The quality seems great for the price and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Fiance as a gift because he has been wanting some adjustable dumbbells for quite some time. He has owned these for almost a year now and they have held up great. The quality seems great for the price and I would highly recommend this set of dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Really good product! I've had them for a while now and they are still fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Hector L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Yes4All Adjustable Dumbbells, 40.00 Pounds ...
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely for working out in home. I am so glad I finally ordered them. The nice things are that the individual plates are held on with 4 screw on collars . And, I love that they are made out of cast iron vs cement. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: spirits&angels

customer_reviews.title: Nicely finished
customer_reviews.text: What's to say, they are weights, other than the finish and quality is much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: GJ Colorado -

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about a month now and they're pretty great. Simple and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: pvq

customer_reviews.title: I'm patient and don't mind only using one dumbbell at ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm patient and don't mind only using one dumbbell at a time for at move 36.5lb. That's the max you can have on one in all honesty. I'm enjoying it though
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I think it should come with a mat or a small support to put it nice on the floor. Everything else it’s just fine, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic dumbells, easy to use, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, excellent quality, decent pricing. Only thing I wish was that they had lighter and heavier options.
customer_reviews.author: Tfamily

customer_reviews.title: Man im getting swole
customer_reviews.text: A bit rough on the hand but you a man
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: they are like any other adjustable weight set I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Solid weights, they are like any other adjustable weight set I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: William Powell

customer_reviews.title: Different sets are not interchangeable.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 100 lb set a couple of years ago. I wanted to buy some more weight so I purchased the 40 lb set. I’m not sure why, but the plates have different diameters so the plates don’t fit on my old handles. So now I have 40lbs of paperweights. Other than that these are great.
customer_reviews.author: gdthvddvbjhhf

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.  U can find better products for same price
customer_reviews.text: Crome coating on bars are chipping away out of the box. Small chips are actually sharp enough to go under your skin. Weights have sharp uneven surface.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay

customer_reviews.title: Not easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The screws are loose. I need to tighten them every time I use the dumbbells', rest is all good
customer_reviews.author: S. Z.

customer_reviews.title: They're ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Mo.ore how I tightened the nuts they keep getting lloose every once of a while
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are good weight, and have great plates but the silver part that should hold the plates on the dumbbell loosen and it can be dangerous. They don't really hold the plates on.
customer_reviews.author: Sioeli Tupou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Pleased with all aspects of the design. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work and everything but when recieved they Were kinda used or something bc they werent clean
customer_reviews.author: Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Work great, weighed as stated. Only thing I'd change is some padding on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these dumbbells... He did not complain anything, it is as expected, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, seems of high quality. The handles are rough, but they are supposed to be. Many negative feedbacks because of that, just wear a glove (although it's not necessary). Dumbbells are not supposed to be soft on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: jousseliett centeno

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great dumbbell set. Easy to switch out and change etc.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: The clips loosen, I have to tighten them every ...
customer_reviews.text: The clips loosen, I have to tighten them every time I use them. Not a big deal as I'd check to be safe anyways, but... Thought I'd mention.
customer_reviews.author: Shay K

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: purchased to use with other 1" weights and so fart so good
customer_reviews.author: Gemel Walters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 year old wanting to get into weights! Love the shipping, prime, no charge for extra weight!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much exactly what you'd expect. Some reviews I read complained about the collars getting loose or even coming off in the middle of working out but I didn't have that problem. The fact that they were so cheap (compared to other dumbbells) given their quality was a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set
customer_reviews.text: Great weight set! Easy to adjust, discs are locked in place tightly, bars are pretty comfortable on the hands. For the price, I can't imagine getting a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Muscles
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I thought they’d be. Can take weight off as needed. Great to have!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: the 40lb set was perfect and dont let other old reviews push you away
customer_reviews.text: Old reviews have showed issues with locking nut not being the right size or complaints of tightening problems. None with mine, not only that but it comes with rubber rings built into the nut and on the bar, so when you tighten the nut it doesn't come undone. Very nice, proper size, solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clean, and simple!
customer_reviews.text: Grip is very comfortable and easy to get used to, the plates slide right on and the 'clamp' screws on with no problem. After a few sets it will spin off just a little bit, but there's no real bother in slightly re-tightening it. You can mix and match your weights a bit for either toning or strength and It's very simple to do and you wont need to buy multiple dumbbell sets to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Derpenshire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! It's a beautiful set. The versatility with just the small set is perfect for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: Good dumbell set
customer_reviews.text: Great item I only wish they didn't roll if they're placed in the floor momentarily
customer_reviews.author: Skybeach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built nice, but only works if you use them, please fix...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They loosen up quickly
customer_reviews.text: They need to be tightened up frequently but I like them
customer_reviews.author: 1eagerbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Carpet weights
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a present. They are now carpet weights. Not their fault. They are very wellade.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I use it every day and have accidently dropped it a couple of times. I accidently dropped it at a height of 7 feet onto cement floor after my shoulder kinda twisted in a weird position, I thought that the weight would've crack seeing how cheap I bought it for but to my surprise it was perfectly fine. I highly recommend getting this for anyone just started weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Rawr

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Used daily since purchase and they have held ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Used daily since purchase and they have held up.
customer_reviews.author: Denis&Michelle

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer
customer_reviews.text: Wow. So affordable and free shipping on 40lb is amazing. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Penn Name

customer_reviews.title: love the dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I wanna buy more plates tho, however I'm happy with the product. The grips on the bars are great and the adjustable locks holds the plates securely
customer_reviews.author: Spell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I started working out at home and these are great! Will purchase more weights when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Bloo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure the mailman wasn't happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure the mailman wasn't happy about this purchase, but I was. Works as intended. Hard to mess up hunks of metal.
customer_reviews.author: ANNALISA FOULDS

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a basic set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a basic set of dumbbells. Going up and down on weight takes a bit of time (hard to move quickly if you are switching between intervals due to the way the plates are attached to the bar), but decent enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mizzell

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: they have a good quality and they are easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Heidari Beisafar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these, not too expensive n not to bulky Good quality too
customer_reviews.author: RazorSlash

customer_reviews.title: good weights
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and great weights I would recommend these for sure
customer_reviews.author: grim and his wife

customer_reviews.title: Useful.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and change the weights. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: ismail demirors

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works well. Rubber comes off but great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matu810

customer_reviews.title: Competitive price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price, better price per pound of weight than i have found anywhere else. Considering buying another set just for the plates because for me it was a good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. But the star collar locks come loose ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. But the star collar locks come loose continuously. Even during use I have to stop and tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described; I use them everyday and they are amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!

customer_reviews.title: Handle is way too skinny the grip destroyed my palms
customer_reviews.text: Don’t lose the rubber band don’t twist anything on with the rubber band . It’s impossible to untwist later
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Me
customer_reviews.text: Others were writing about paint coming off of the free weights and about a strong odor. I did not experience a bad odor. There was a slight oily smell, but nothing like others were describing. I wiped the weights with a wet rag and some paint came off, but I have no paint transferring to my carpet. The quality of the dumbbells is very good. I especially like the rubber o-ring on the threaded sleeve that helps keep the weights from shifting - a problem I've had with other dumbbells of this type. I priced these out vs. Dick's Sporting Goods and, even with the shipping charges, they were cheaper than Dick's.
customer_reviews.author: David EckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good adjustable weights. Eventually you have to frighten them, but they are sturdy and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Epperson

product_meta.title: Yes4All Adjustable Dumbbells, 40.00 Pounds
product_meta.description:
PREMIUM YES4ALL ADJUSTABLE DUMBBELLS

Yes4All Dumbbells features high performing rust resistant SOLID CAST IRON PLATES, ergonomic textured SOLID CHROME HANDLES and secure SPIN-LOCK STAR COLLARS.

Adjustable Dumbbells are easy to use and do not require much storage space, allowing you to vary your daily workout routines with interchangeable weights. You can start from beginning to the next level easily by simply changing the plates to train a single muscle group at a time or different muscle groups simultaneously to develop your strength & muscle gains in arms, shoulders and back.

WEIGHT PLATE SIZES AND PACKAGE CONTENTS: 

Set of 40 LBS, 50 LBS, 60 LBS: Holes on weight plates fit standard bar with diameter of 1". Dumbbell handle has 1-inch-diameter. 

Set of 52.5 LBS, 105, 200 LBS: Holes on weight plates fit standard bar with diameter of 1.15". Dumbbell handle has 1.15-inch-diameter. 
40 LBS SET - TWO Handles, FOUR Collars, FOUR 5-lbs Plates, FOUR 3-lbs Plates
50 LBS SET - TWO Handles, FOUR Collars, FOUR 3-lbs Plates, FOUR 7.5-lbs Plates (sometimes, we use 8 lbs instead of 7.5 lbs)
52.50 LBS SET – ONE Handle, TWO Collars, EIGHT 5-lbs Plates, TWO 2.5-lbs Plates, TWO 1.25-lb Plates
60 LBS SET - TWO Handles, FOUR Collars, FOUR 5-lbs Plates, FOUR 8-lbs Plates
105 LBS SET – TWO Handle, FOUR Collars, SIXTEEN 5-lbs Plates, FOUR 2.5-lbs Plates, FOUR 1.25-lb Plates
200 LBS SET - TWO Handles, FOUR Collars, FOUR 2.5-lbs Plates, FOUR 5-lbs Plates, SIXTEEN 10-lbs Plates

WARRANTY: 60-Day Return and 5-Year Warranty on weight plates and parts.

Note: For 200 lbs Set:
This item includes 3 packages. 
Box 1 and box 2 contain the same parts. 
Customers might receive any of the following:
2 x Box 1 + Box 3, or
2 x Box 2 + Box 3, or
Box 1 + Box 2 + Box 3
feature_bullets: SET OF 2 DUMBBELLS - 40 LBS TOTAL: TWO 14”x 1” handles, FOUR 3-pound plates, FOUR 5-pound plates, FOUR collars
CAST IRON WEIGHT PLATES FIT 1-INCH STANDARD BAR: Accommodate all standard 1-inch handles. Durable cast iron plates covered with black paint finish preventing rust and corrosion for lifetime use
14-INCH DIAMOND KNURLED CHROME HANDLE: Constructed of high-quality, textured chrome handle for secure, firm, and non-slip grip for a secure fit; Plates are made from durable cast iron
STAR-LOCK COLLARS WITH LOOSE-RESISTANT RUBBER TRIMS: Threaded ends with star-lock collars provide a safe, secure workout & easy weight plate changes

EASY USE & STORAGE: Take seconds to assemble and take out. Compact, convenient, and easy to use and store. All-for-one dumbbells eliminate the need for multiple dumbbells in your workout space. Suitable for performing basic toning body workouts
